mapper.select: select dongCode, sidoName from dongcode where gugunName is null and dongName is null order by dongcode
select dongCode, dongName from dongcode where dongName is not null and sidoName = #{sidoName} and gugunName=#{gugunName} order by dongcode

select count(i.aptCode) from houseinfo i inner join dongcode d on d.dongCode = i.dongCode where d.sidoName = #{sidoName} and d.gugunName = #{gugunName} and d.dongName=#{dongName} and i.apartmentName like concat('%',#{aptName},'%')
select * from housedeal where aptCode = #{aptCode} and cancelDealType != 'O' order by replace(dealAmount,",","")+0,dealYear,dealMonth,dealDay,area
